Title: Silverlight ChesSDK
Description: SL_ChesSDK is a Silverlight library used for building Silverlight chess applications such as browser-based PGN viewers, opening/tactical/endgame position training systems or even as a frontend to an online chess server.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SL_ChesSDK is a Silverlight library used for building Silverlight chess applications such as browser-based PGN viewers, opening/tactical/endgame position training systems or even as a frontend to an online chess server.
